page.title: 05My Baby Brother
page.content: On Saturday June 1st 1985 my new baby brother was born at Ashington Hospital. He weighed 7lb 6ozs. He has long black hair, fat legs and long feet. He has blue eyes and we call him Daniel. We bought a pram for him, it is brown. A pram is very useful, the baby can be taken for walks in it. He has a white bath to get washed in and some little towels to get dried on. My mam put talc on him to make him smell nice. He wears nappies because he is not old enough to go to the toilet. When my Mam came home from the hospital the Health Visitor came to see her and the baby. On Tuesday June the 17th my mam took Daniel to the Health Centre. The nurse weighed him and he was 8lb 7ozs.
